$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for validation.

includeOptionsRequests.description: Determines whether to include OPTIONS requests in the generated OpenAPI spec. Default: false.

ignoreResponseTypes.description: Determines whether to ignore response types in the generated OpenAPI spec. Default: false.

specVersion.description: Specifies the OpenAPI spec version to generate. Allowed values: 'v2_0' or 'v3_0'. Default: 'v3_0'.

specFormat.description: Specifies the format of the generated OpenAPI spec. Allowed values: 'Json' or 'Yaml'. Default: 'Json'.

includeParameters.description: Defines the list of query string parameters to include in the generated OpenAPI spec, along with their default values. Default: []
